header.mainmsg: BI Teamwork is a end user experience plug-in for Oracle BI that provides social communication, notifications, dashboard commentary,and other augmenting features. These features complement Oracle BI and add value to the overall UX.

nav.selectoptionmsg: Select an Administrative Option from the left to begin.

security.msgwarningnoinitialsync: It appears that you have not conducted the initial Sync with the BI System to gather the users and application roles. Click on the OBIEE Web Service Link, enter the credentials, then use the Sync Manager.
